bibl.title: Hands and Book-Rolls in P.Oxy. 4411: the First Extant Papyrus Witness for Plato's Critias (P.Oxy. 4411, frr. 88-90 + 92 + 94-95).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIV, 4411 (= M.-P.3 1450.01; LDAB 4878), frr. 88-90 + 92 + 94-95. - 1. Introduction. - 2. P.Oxy. 4410 and P.Oxy. 4411. - 3. P.Oxy. 4411: how many book-rolls? - 4. The first extant papyrus for Plato's Critias. - 5. Fragment 91.
bibl.seg: Lucia Prauscello & Giuseppe Ucciardello, Hands and Book-Rolls in P.Oxy. 4411: the First Extant Papyrus Witness for Plato's Critias (P.Oxy. 4411, frr. 88-90 + 92 + 94-95).

P. Oxy. LXIV, 4411 (= M.-P.3 1450.01; LDAB 4878), frr. 88-90 + 92 + 94-95. - 1. Introduction. - 2. P.Oxy. 4410 and P.Oxy. 4411. - 3. P.Oxy. 4411: how many book-rolls? - 4. The first extant papyrus for Plato's Critias. - 5. Fragment 91.
